post:
We are pleased to inform you, that EDIS finished upgrading its Zurich based network-infrastructure. Every EDIS VPS hostnode received its own full-duplex gigabit uplink to the EDIS backbone and OpenVZ is available in Switzerland as of now.

http://www.edis.at/en/server/linux-vps-solusvm-openvz/zurich/


*** OpenVZ Promotion, 50% discount for a lifetime ***

COUPON-Code: OVZ-LI-CH-US-IS-50-OFF

Works on: 

OpenVZ Liechtenstein (Balzers) http://www.edis.at/en/server/linux-vps-solusvm-openvz/liechtenstein/

OpenVZ Switzerland (Zurich) http://www.edis.at/en/server/linux-vps-solusvm-openvz/zurich/

OpenVZ USA (Chicago) http://www.edis.at/en/server/linux-vps-solusvm-openvz/united-states-chicago/

OpenVZ Iceland (Hafnarfjordur) http://www.edis.at/en/server/linux-vps-solusvm-openvz/iceland/


Cheapest plan starts with this coupon at **2,495EUR** (4,99EUR in Liechtenstein) with:

<pre>
512MB RAM
50GB HDD
1 IPv4, 10 IPv6
2TB Traffic (Iceland 1TB, Liechtenstein 500GB)
</pre>
